title: "Mark Stott's Stockport County partners with AI start-up GroundWOW"
excerpt: "Stockport County, who are owned by prominent businessman Mark Stott, have signed a deal with a company which develops autonomous machines which print on the ground. GroundWOW is led by chairman and CEO Tony Rhoades and was launched in the fourth quarter of 2019."
